Package BobcatLib.Subsystems.Climbers

Class ClimberSubsystem

java.lang.Object
edu.wpi.first.wpilibj2.command.SubsystemBase
BobcatLib.Subsystems.Climbers.ClimberSubsystem
All Implemented Interfaces:
Sendable, Subsystem
public class ClimberSubsystem extends SubsystemBase
Represents the climber subsystem, responsible for managing the climber's behavior and periodically updating its inputs.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClimberSubsystem

      public ClimberSubsystem(String name, ClimberIO io)
      Constructs a ClimberSubsystem with the specified name and input-output interface.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the climber subsystem.
      io - The ClimberIO interface for hardware interaction.

  • Method Details

    • periodic

      public void periodic()
      Periodically updates the climber's inputs and handles its control behavior.

      This method is called regularly by the scheduler to update telemetry and control logic. It also uses AdvantageKit's Logger to log the climber's inputs for diagnostics.

    • setPercentOut

      public void setPercentOut(double percent)
      Sets the climber motor's output percentage.

      The output value should be between -1.0 (full reverse) and 1.0 (full forward).

      Parameters:
      percent - The desired motor output percentage (-1.0 to 1.0).

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Stops the climber mechanism by setting motor output to zero.

      This method also resets the output percentage tracking.
